title: RxJS Fundamentals
description: RxJS fundamentals is a free and open text-based course about RxJS. It is a collection of short, well-written lessons that teach you the fundamentals of RxJS: Observables, Operators, Subjects, and how to use them. I collabaorated with Lars Gyrup Brink Nielsen, Santosh Yadav, Maina Wycliffe, Chau Tran, Olexandr Poshtaryuk and others on this

title: NgRx Essentials
description: NgRx Essentials is a free and open text-based course about NgRx. It is a guided tutorial with examples that explainsthe essential features of NgRx: Store, Actions, Effects, Reducers, and how to use them. I collabaorated with Lars Gyrup Brink Nielsen and Alain Boudard on this
